error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'new_bales_quantity' (20) was used instead of 'new_cost_per_bale' (18).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 250
The hay previously cost $15 per bale so 10 bales would cost $15*10 = $<<15*10=150>>150
Double 10 bales is 10*2 = <<10*2=20>>20 bales
Better quality hay cost $20 per bale so 20 bales would cost $20*20 = $<<20*20=400>>400
Farmer Brown would need $400-$150 = $<<400-150=250>>250 more
